title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH (from its context menu), nothing happens. This menu should either be removed or, preferably, the action should add the field's Javadoc.
OB: When selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu of a field in TH, no action is taken.
EB: When selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu of a field in TH, the field's Javadoc should be added.
SR:
1. Open TH.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
